name: gpt3-telephone-chatbot
description: GPT-3 (Generative Pre-trained Transformer 3) is a highly advanced language model from [OpenAI](https://openai.com). Its claim to fame is its ability to generate written text that is virtually indistinguishable from human-written text. The internal workings of GPT-3 get complex for sure. However, using GPT-3 via the OpenAI API is surprisingly simple. and in this tutorial,  youâ€™ll see just how simple it is while building a GPT-3 powered telephone chatbot.
